protocol.name: P-GSE58370-1
protocol.text: The data was analysed with GeneSpring GX (vers. 7.3) from Agilent. Preprocessing was performed with included RMA Plugin. ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA signal intensity

protocol.name: P-GSE58370-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana (accession Columbia) were grown in a nutrient-rich, medium-grade, peat-based compost in Percival AR95 growth chambers (CLF Plant Climatics) at a constant temperature of 20°C, 70% humidity and a 12-h light period with constant, uniform light intensity of 150 μmol•m-2•s-1.

protocol.name: P-GSE58370-4
protocol.text: For RNA extraction, RNeasy Plant Mini kit was used (according to instructions from Qiagen). Extracted RNA was precipitated ?ul RNA; 8 µl 3 M Sodium acetate (pH 5.2); 2 µl Glycogen(5mg/ml); -80°C? how long? than 30 min 13000 rpm 4°C. 2 times washing with 70% ethanol. resuspended in DEPC water. RNA quantity and integrity were assessed using RNA 6000 Nano LabChip Kit and the BioAnalyzer software (Agilent).

protocol.name: P-GSE58370-5
protocol.text: 1µg of total RNA were used to synthesize amplified labeled cRNA (MessageAmp™ II aRNA Biotin Amplification Kit; Ambion).

protocol.name: P-GSE58370-6
protocol.text: After fragmentation of cRNA using the RNA Fragmentation Reagents (Ambion), 13.5 µg of cRNA was hybridized to Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array (ATH1-121501) according to manufacturer's manual. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450 using the protocol 'EukGE-WS2V4'.

protocol.name: P-GSE58370-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip® scanner GS3000 7G according to manufacturer's manual.
